feed.title: Queen City Stacks
feed.subtitle: he five-best Cincinnati stories, every day.

entry.title: Mapping ridership on a linear corridor
entry.summary: Nate Wessell is at it again. This time the transportation data nerd takes a look at ridership data and routes along Cincinnati's METRO line. Interesting stuff, too bad it's so hard for him to actually get this data. Someone at METRO should hire this kid, pronto.
entry.content: Nate Wessell is at it again. This time the transportation data nerd takes a look at ridership data and routes along Cincinnati's METRO line. Interesting stuff, too bad it's so hard for him to actually get this data. Someone at METRO should hire this kid, pronto.

entry.title: Businesses ordered to leave struggling Tower Place Mall in downtown Cincinnati
entry.summary: First it was retail shops, now it's businesses. Tower Place can't buy a basket. The struggling downtown mall has ordered all five of it's remaining tenants to leave. The once-popular mall year-to-date income losses are more than $1 million.
entry.content: First it was retail shops, now it's businesses. Tower Place can't buy a basket. The struggling downtown mall has ordered all five of it's remaining tenants to leave. The once-popular mall year-to-date income losses are more than $1 million.
